SELECT COUNT(1) AS total, AVG(er.score) AS avgScore, MAX(er.score) AS maxScore, MIN(er.score) AS minScore, SUM(CASE WHEN er.score IS NOT NULL AND er.score >= e.pass_score THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS passCount FROM biz_exam_record er JOIN biz_exam e ON e.id = er.exam_id
er.exam_id = #{examId}

SELECT tcmap.classId AS classId, tcmap.className AS name, AVG(er.score) AS avgScore, COUNT(1) AS count FROM biz_exam_student es JOIN biz_exam e ON e.id = es.exam_id JOIN biz_paper p ON p.id = e.paper_id LEFT JOIN biz_subject s ON s.name COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci = p.subject JOIN users u ON u.id = es.user_id LEFT JOIN biz_student bs ON bs.user_id = es.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tcs.user_id AS userId, tc.subject_id AS subjectId, MIN(tc.id) AS classId, MIN(tc.name) AS className FROM biz_teaching_class_student tcs JOIN biz_teaching_class tc ON tc.id = tcs.class_id GROUP BY tcs.user_id, tc.subject_id ) tcmap ON tcmap.userId = es.user_id AND tcmap.subjectId = s.id LEFT JOIN biz_exam_record er ON er.exam_id = es.exam_id AND er.student_id = es.user_id
es.exam_id = #{examId} AND tcmap.classId IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY tcmap.classId, tcmap.className ORDER BY tcmap.className
SELECT er.score FROM biz_exam_record er WHERE er.exam_id = #{examId} AND er.score IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_exam_record SET score = #{score}, status = COALESCE(#{status}, status) WHERE id = #{recordId}

UPDATE biz_exam_answer SET score = #{score}, comment = #{comment}, is_correct = CASE WHEN #{score} IS NOT NULL AND #{score} > 0 THEN 1 ELSE is_correct END WHERE record_id = #{recordId} AND question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_exam_record (exam_id, student_id, score, status) VALUES (#{examId}, #{studentId}, #{score}, #{status})
INSERT INTO biz_score_adjustment (score_id, original_score, new_score, reason, adjuster_id) VALUES (#{scoreId}, #{originalScore}, #{newScore}, #{reason}, NULL)
